phases.title: Phase 1: Foundation
phases.description: Establish security fundamentals and build security awareness

phases.title: Phase 2: Integration
phases.description: Integrate security into development workflows and CI/CD pipelines

phases.title: Phase 3: Optimization
phases.description: Optimize security processes and achieve security maturity

items.title: Establish Security Champions
items.description: Identify and train security champions within development teams to promote security culture.
items.assessment: Survey team members on security awareness

items.title: Implement Basic Security Training
items.description: Provide foundational security training covering OWASP Top 10, secure coding practices, and threat modeling basics.

items.title: Integrate SAST in CI/CD
items.description: Implement Static Application Security Testing in continuous integration pipelines to catch security issues early.
items.assessment: Zero critical SAST findings in production

items.title: Implement Container Security
items.description: Secure container images and runtime environments with scanning and policy enforcement.
items.assessment: Zero high/critical CVEs in production containers

items.title: Implement Threat Modeling Processes
items.description: Establish systematic threat modeling practices for identifying and mitigating security risks in application design.
items.assessment: Threat models completed for all new features

items.title: Establish Security Metrics and KPIs
items.description: Define and track security metrics to measure program effectiveness and drive continuous improvement.
items.assessment: Monthly security dashboard reviews with stakeholders
